name: Smile Fruit Pair
description:
Easy to play and addictive fruit match game for all age. Simply link fruit, and clear all fruits before timeout.

How to play Onet?
1. Tap the fruit to select it.
2. Connect 2 same fruits by using 3 or less than 3 lines to eliminate.
3. Clear all fruit pairs before timeout.

Features:
1.More than 1000 challenging levels
2.Many game props.
3.Sweet and delicious UI & cool animation effects.
4.Three different game modes(all free)
Download and have a good time in free onet game fruit link!
